alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; McPherson; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 1:30PM MST until November 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell, McPherson, Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow are expected overnight and on Thursday. Visibility reductions are possible especially over rural areas and during snow showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
